answers.answer: I would love to be able to lay in bed all day that would be living the dream right there instead of being grumpy going to work all day lol

Omg same here and they might not want me to go back to work. I need to go to work and then on top of that I have gestational diabetes so it's like this is the worst possible time for this I'm beyond emotional and angry. Its like why me..

I have been there and it's ruff but you have to think about your health and your baby. I had everything from books, nail polish, movies and friend's and family in my face to try to past the time. Unfortunately I lost my first-round at 22 weeks. Please take it easy and listen to your doctor.
I know how you feel. I just got off bed rest today after 3 weeks of being in bed. I read a lot of pregnancy books to pass the time. I hope you and your little one is doing well.

I just got off of bed rest ....it was the best, no cleaning the house, no cooking, i got to sleep, watch movies and just enjoy my babys movements and just knowing that my baby is going to be better off ...if i stay off my feet im ok will that ..its only 9 months !!! Cause when my baby girl gets here im wish i had bed rest again...lol

question: Third day of bedrest. No getting up other than to use the bathroom. I am cranky, beyond frustrated, and so uncomfortable. I know this is all to ensure my baby stays put, but goodness gracious how am I suppose to live like this for 22 more weeks?!
title: Losing my mind!!!!
